title.rendered: DeepMind Scholarship at Queen Mary University of London, UK 2024

content.rendered:
Queen Mary University of London in the United Kingdom is excited to share news of the 2025 DeepMind Scholarship. This prestigious scholarship offers an incredible opportunity for master’s study in the fields of Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning for Visual Data Analytics, and Computer Games. Applications are welcome from candidates of all nationalities who are interested in pursuing these areas of study.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • Eligibility Criteria | DeepMind Scholarship at Queen Mary University of London 2025
  • Scholarship Benefits

The DeepMind Scholarship at Queen Mary University of London is a program specifically designed to support and encourage individuals from underrepresented groups to pursue postgraduate education in the aforementioned fields. It particularly aims to provide opportunities for female and black students who are currently underrepresented in these areas of study. This scholarship reflects our commitment to fostering diversity and inclusivity within academia.

Scholarship Sponsor(s): Queen Mary University of London

Scholarship Type: Education Support

Host Institution(s): Queen Mary University of London

Scholarship Worth: See Scholarship benefits (below)

Number of Awards: 4 scholarships this year

Application Deadline: 05 July 2025

Study Level: Postgraduate

Nationality: All Nationalities

Eligibility Criteria | DeepMind Scholarship at Queen Mary University of London 2025

To be eligible to apply for a DeepMind Scholarship for study in the United Kingdom:

  • The applicant must be a UK or International student.
  • The applicant must identify as female or have one of the following categories of ethnicity: Black African; Black Caribbean; Black Other; Mixed – White and Black Caribbean; Mixed – White and Black African; or Other mixed background (to include Black African, Black Caribbean or Black Other).
  • The applicant must have a confirmed offer to study on one of the following programmes in September 2025: MSc in Artificial Intelligence (Full Time), MSc Computer Science (Full Time), MSc Computer Games (Full Time), and MSc in Machine Learning for Visual Data Analytics (Full Time) at Queen Mary University of London.

Scholarship Benefits

DeepMind Scholarship is a fully funded scholarship programme in that each scholarship will cover;

  • the cost of tuition fees, £11,850 (International fees – £27,250),
  • a living allowance of £15,480, an annual £2,000 travel scholarship and
  • a one-off equipment grant of £1,500.

Application Procedures

  • How-to-Apply: Interested and eligible candidates for the 2025 DeepMind Scholarship are to download the DeepMind Scholarship Application Form 2025, complete and submit the application form to ioc@qmul.ac.uk on or before the application deadline.
  • Application Documents: You application should comprise of the following documents and presented according to the instructions stated at the official application page.
  • A copy of your offer letter to study any of the eligible programmes
  • A completed application form, including a short statement (500 words)
  • A curriculum vitae (CV)

Visit the Official Website for Further Details
